texts.name: Lv Mu
texts.biography: Lv Mu is a giant snake and possesses the ability to control the mind of all breeds of snakes.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Snake Graspers, Snake Bearers, and Jiu Yings by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Snake Graspers
